text: Alam Tara 'Ila Al-Mala'i Min Bani 'Isra'ila Min Ba`di Musa 'Idh Qalu Linabiyin Lahum Ab`ath Lana Malikaan Nuqatil Fi Sabili Allahi Qala Hal `Asaytum 'In Kutiba `Alaykumu Al-Qitalu 'Alla Tuqatilu Qalu Wa Ma Lana 'Alla Nuqatila Fi Sabili Allahi Wa Qad 'Ukhrijna Min Diyarina Wa 'Abna'ina Falamma Kutiba `Alayhimu Al-Qitalu Tawallaw 'Illa Qalilaan Minhum Wa Allahu `Alimun Biz-Zalimina
